name: Lakshmi Nagaraj
tagline: Wife * Mother * Engineer * Programmer * Time juggler
body:
### Contact
***
email : lakshmi dot nagraj at gmail dot com

[ twitter ](https://twitter.com/lakshmi_nagaraj)

[ linkedin](http://in.linkedin.com/in/lakshminagaraj/)

### Professional Experience
***
>~8 years of software development, planning and management experience

>Associated with RBEI - [Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Pvt. Ltd][1] (***Jul 2005 - Present***)

>- Associate project manager, RBEI. Sep 2012 - Present
- Specialist, RBEI. Oct 2010 - Sep 2012
- Senior Software Engineer. RBEI. Oct 2007 - Oct 2010
- Software Engineer. RBEI. Jul 2005 - Oct 2007 

### Achievements / Highlights
***
>- Sparkle of the Quarter, Q1 2013
- Performance award at the department level, 2010
- Performance award at the department level, 2008
- Sun Certified Java Programmer (SCJP).
- Stood 12th in Karnataka state in S.S.L.C (Xth) board exam.
- Stood 3rd in Karnataka state in Dasara Classical Dance Competition-1999.

### Education
***
> Bachelor of Engineering (Information Science), 2005. **Aggregate: 81.31%**

> XII Class, 2001. **Aggregate: 92.67%**

> X Class, 1999. **Aggregate: 95.68%**

### Technical Skills
***
> **Applications programming** : Java,  Eclipse plugin development, RCP, SWT, JFace, BIRT, EMF

> **Web/Internet programming** : J2EE (Seam, JSF, Richfaces), JBoss AS 6.0.0, Struts

> **Database/ORM** : Oracle 10g, MySQL, Hibernate, TOPLink

> **Process/Practice** : Scrum, Test Driven Development, Aspect Oriented Programming

> **Domain Expertise** : Automotive, Thermotechnology – Controllers, Modules


### List of projects
***
#####1. SPOTT (Planning and Scheduling Projects of TT)  -  Jan 2012 to Present

>Project Planner tool that enables the line management and the project managers to plan projects, roadmaps, allocate roles and resources based on their availability, calculate budget planned, consumed and remaining.


>*Role: Associate Project Manager, Lead Developer*

>*Technology: Java, J2EE (Seam, JSF, Richfaces, Hibernate), Eclipse RCP*

>* Requirements gathering, user story development, meeting stakeholder expectations
* Designing workflow, calculation algorithms, work breakdown structures
* Database design – Oracle 10g
* Assigning tasks to the team based on the WBS and ensuring completeness

#####2. Reco Reporting Tool  -  Jun 2011 to Dec 2011

>Reporting Tool to generate excel based reports of the CRS(customer requirement specifications), Traceability matrixes, statistical reports. The tool gave options to filter search criteria for generating excel based reports


>*Role: Lead Developer*

>*Technology: Java, Seam, JSF, Hibernate, Richfaces, VB Macro, JBoss AS 6.0.0*

>* End to end development and technical responsibility for the project

#####3. CompLITT (Component Level Integrated Test Tool)  -  Jan 2011 to May 2011

>CompLITT enable automatic execution of the test specification for component level testing CL2.3 and CL3


>*Role: Associate Project Manager, Lead Developer*

>*Technology: Eclipse RCP*

>* CL2.3 testing automation possibility paved the path for future tool co-operations with TT divisions

#####4. Calibration Data management  -  Oct 2010 to Dec 2010

>CompLITT enable automatic execution of the test specification for component level testing CL2.3 and CL3


>*Role: Associate Project Manager, Lead Developer*

>*Technology: Eclipse RCP*

>* CL2.3 testing automation possibility paved the path for future tool co-operations with TT divisions

#####4. XDIReconverter  -  Jul 2010 to Feb 2011

>DGS development takes place in SDOM and uses the XDI process. The tool enables conversion of XDI related artifacts into older SCM systems such as Clearcase, NESTOR, Arcus by removing the XDI data using appropriate conversion rules. XDI data present in the xml files must be converted into output XML files without XDI but adhering to the older development processes


>*Role: Senior Developer*

>*Technology: Java, Clearcase*

>* Proposal preparation for tool support, requirements gathering, mentoring one team members

#####5. MigExplorer, Migration APIs  -  Aug 2009 to Dec 2010

>The Migration API enables other tool developers by interacting with the SDOM database. The API would be the single interface to the database and further tools developed would only interact with the API. MigExplorer tool is an RCP application developed to show the Shadow table contents to the user, enable searching of the SDOM elements by using search criteria


>*Role: Senior Developer*

>*Technology: Java, RCP*

>* Concept Proposal, Design and Implementation

#####6. ccExporter  -  Jan 2009 to Aug 2009

>This tool enables transferring of clearcase files into eASEE SCM system. It builds the folder structure compatible with eASEE SDOM by using the clearcase files as inputs and determining the appropriate eASEE file type using defined file rules


>*Role: Senior Developer*

>*Technology: Eclipse RCP application*

>* Implementation and Maintenance

#####7. Bundlegen  -  Jun 2008 to Dec 2008

>The tool automates creation of a SW bundle which is further input to the GM CalDS tool. The tool would check for correct JRE version usage, read excel input file, call external scripts, start TBCon and run clearcase commands, compare hex files and zip all the output files into a SW bundle


>*Role: Senior Developer*

>*Technology: Java*

>* Requirements gathering, analysis, feasibility study for executing various external scripts from a Java application

#####7. Elvis (EDC Delivery information system)  -  Jul 2005 to Jun 2008

>The tool is web-based and is used by other development teams across Bosch. This tool will give detailed information about all the customer projects and platform packages developed by other teams, their deliveries and the status of the deliveries. It will also give complete reuse information of platform packages in the customer projects. It will also give bug information of various projects and other projects that get affected by the bug.


>*Role: Developer, Team lead*

>*Technology:  Java, JSP, Ajax, Struts, Springs, ExtJS*

>* End to end implementation, maintenance and management


  [1]: http://www.bosch.com "Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Pvt. Ltd"
